[DQC.IFRS.0129.9606] It is expected that EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent with a value of 3,527,000,000 reported in the network role http://bawaggroup.com/xbrl/2020/roles/EigenkapitalUndSchulden should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParentMember and a reported value of 3,824,300,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://bawaggroup.com/xbrl/2020/roles/Eigenkapitalveraenderungsrechnung. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
Period : 2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent : -6 Decimals of Equity : 1 Rule version: 17.0.0 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900S9YO2JHTIIDG38/2020-12-31/ESEF/AT/0/bawaggroup-2020-12-31.zip/bawaggroup-2020-12-31/reports/bawaggroup-2020-12-31.xhtml 5692

entry.message:

This value appears in the network role http://bawaggroup.com/xbrl/2020/roles/Eigenkapitalveraenderungsrechnung. The properties of this ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
